name: Game Over: Press Start to Begin
name_original: Game Over: Press Start to Begin
description:
A young boy begins a small journey to the top of his island village to investigate what is going on in town. 

Genre:
Adventure/Puzzler/3D Platformer

Controls:
Movement: WASD or Left Analog
Interact: "E" on keyboard or "B" on controller
Jump: Spacebar or "A" on controller 


Created by: 
Alain Bellemare
Andrea Woodford
Dyane Eugenio
Glen Manalo
Laura Sajdik

Animations from: Mixamo.com
Additional Sound Editing by: Steven Woodford
Music: Relent Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Sound Effects provided by: FreeSound.org
